description.value: You are a creature of the material world, with an affinity closer to the wilds than urban society. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals [[/r 1d6 #piercing]] piercing damage. Your jaws are in the brawling group and have the finesse and unarmed traits. Your alternate form is a fox, which has the statistics of 1stâ€‘level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Pest Form]{Pest Form}.
